common.errorLoadingProducts: An error occurred while loading products.
common.pickupTimeNotice: Up to 48 hours before the tour departure, we continue to accept other reservations, which means additional hotels may be added. Therefore, we cannot confirm the departure time until then. 48 hours before the tour departure, we close all pickup location requests from all participants, finalize the exact pickup times, and send pickup schedule notifications to customers.
common.pickupTimeApproximate: ※ The time shown above is approximate. The exact pickup time will be confirmed and notified 48 hours before the tour departure.
common.pickupHotelNotSelected: If you do not select your preferred pickup hotel by 48 hours before the tour departure, you will need to come directly to one of the hotels scheduled for that day.
common.allPickupTimeNotice: Pickup times for other hotels are subject to change. Up to 48 hours before the tour departure, additional reservations may be added, so exact times may not be confirmed.
common.recruitingNotice: This tour is currently recruiting participants. The departure will be confirmed once the minimum number of participants is reached.
common.simulationUserNoReservations: No reservation information available for the simulated user.
common.noToursReserved: No tours have been reserved yet.
common.heroSubtitle2: Create memories that will last a lifetime

dynamicPricingPage.includedExcludedHint: You can view and edit the included/excluded details from the channel settings.
dynamicPricingPage.basePriceEditHint: You can change the base price on the product edit page.
dynamicPricingPage.noRulesToSave: No price rules to save. Please enter price information.
dynamicPricingPage.batchSaveFailed: Batch save failed. Trying individual save...
dynamicPricingPage.confirmDeleteDates: Delete price rules for {count} selected date(s) ({dates})?
dynamicPricingPage.couponTooltip: Customer pay & Net Price recalc with this discount
dynamicPricingPage.doubleClickHint: Double-click a date to toggle sale/closed
dynamicPricingPage.choiceCalendarHint: Select a choice to see its calendar
dynamicPricingPage.noRowsHint: No rows. Click "Add row" to add.
dynamicPricingPage.realtimeCalcHint: Enter prices to see calculated results.
dynamicPricingPage.singlePriceModeDesc: One unified price for all ages
dynamicPricingPage.commissionOnSaleOnly: Commission & coupon on sale price only
dynamicPricingPage.commissionOnSaleOnlyDesc: Commission/coupon apply to base sale price only
dynamicPricingPage.commissionOnTotalDesc2: Same rate applied to all price components
dynamicPricingPage.notIncludedAmountOnlyDesc: Only the set not-included amount is balance
dynamicPricingPage.otaFormulaBaseOnly: Base price only (choice excluded, 20% off excluded, coupon excluded) / (1 - {percent}%) = OTA sale price
dynamicPricingPage.otaFormulaFull: Max sale × 0.8 (20% off) / (1 - {coupon}% coupon) / (1 - {commission}% commission) = OTA sale price
dynamicPricingPage.otaChoiceExcludedNote: Choice price and not-included amount are excluded from OTA sale calculation and handled as balance.
dynamicPricingPage.commissionOnSaleOnlyNote: Choice price and not-included amount are excluded from commission/coupon and handled as balance.
dynamicPricingPage.commissionExample: e.g. Sale ($140) + Choice ($75) + Not included ($15) = $230 total. Commission 10% = $14 (on $140 only). Net = ($140 - $14) + $75 + $15 = $216. Balance = $75 + $15 = $90
dynamicPricingPage.notIncludedAmountOnlyDesc2: Not-included amount is excluded from commission and handled as balance. Collected in cash after tour.
dynamicPricingPage.notIncludedAndChoiceDesc2: Not-included amount + choice price are excluded from commission. Sum is handled as balance and collected in cash after tour.
dynamicPricingPage.notIncludedNoneDesc: No not-included amount set. All amounts are paid online.
dynamicPricingPage.allAgesSamePrice: One unified price for all ages.
dynamicPricingPage.costPriceNote: Same cost price applies to Adult/Child/Infant.
dynamicPricingPage.notIncludedZeroHint: Setting to 0 will clear the not-included amount.

actionRequired.title: Action Required
actionRequired.manualTitle: Which reservations appear in each tab
actionRequired.manualIntro: Each tab shows only reservations that match the conditions below.
actionRequired.manualStatus: Reservations with **pending** status and tour date **within the next 7 days** (from today)
actionRequired.manualTour: Reservations with **confirmed** status that are **not yet assigned to a tour**
actionRequired.manualPricing: ① Reservations with no stored total price, ② Reservations where **stored total** and **calculated total** (from current options) **differ**
actionRequired.manualDeposit: ① Reservations that **have payment/deposit** but are **not assigned to a tour**, ② **Confirmed** reservations with **no payment record**
actionRequired.manualBalance: Reservations whose **tour date has passed** and **balance is greater than 0** (outstanding balance)
actionRequired.manualFollowUpCancel: **Cancelled** reservations, sorted by **most recently updated** status first.

info.title: Booking Management Guide
items: Real reservations must be completed by paying suppliers 2 days before the tour.
Check and update booking records regularly as tour participants may change.
All changes are automatically recorded in history and can be checked anytime.
Please update the status when changing from tentative to real reservation.

tagTranslations.title: Tag & Translation Management
tagTranslations.tagKeyDescription: Starts with lowercase English, only numbers and underscore(_) allowed
tagTranslations.systemTagDescription1: ✓ System Tag: Automatically generated default tags (e.g: popular, new, recommended)
tagTranslations.systemTagDescription2: ✓ User Tag: Custom tags created by users
tagTranslations.systemTagDescription3: ✓ No functional difference currently, for categorization purposes.
tagTranslations.pronunciationInfo: 💡 Translations can be added later. Not required to enter now.
tagTranslations.pronunciationTooltip:
💡 In the pronunciation field, you can enter multiple pronunciations separated by pipe (|).
For example: "Las Vegas|라스베이거스" or "Grand Canyon|그랜드 캐니온"
tagTranslations.addTagSuccess: Tag added. You can add translations now.
tagTranslations.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this translation?
tagTranslations.tagKeyInvalid:
Tag key must start with lowercase English letter, only numbers and underscore(_) allowed.
Examples: my_new_tag, las_vegas

passUpload.title: Pass & ID Photo Upload

passUpload.fileFormat: File Format: JPEG, PNG, GIF, WebP (Max 5MB)
passUpload.privacyNotice: Uploaded information will be deleted after tour completion in accordance with our privacy policy.
passUpload.privacyDesc: Your uploaded pass and ID photos will only be used for tour reservations and operations. They will be immediately deleted after tour completion in accordance with our privacy policy. We collect only the minimum information necessary to provide safe services.
